attributes.action: Referendum by the British people on acceptance of the terms of exit from the EU.
attributes.additional_details: The conditions of the UK leaving the EU still need to be agreed and it is only at that point when decisions that affect us all can be made. The UK public should have the right to vote if the terms for exit are acceptable? Securing International agreement on this right.
attributes.background: Country is split by the latest Referendum on leaving the EU with many Leave voters feeling upset about the campaign and how they were mislead. However the people have spoken and the UK government see it as their duty to carry out Article 50.
